about_the_game:
This is a scrabble game designed for poetry and literature lovers. It skillfully uses the random arrangement of Chinese characters on the roulette wheel, combined with a variety of props, to build a challenging and fun platform for players to create poetry. In the game, players need to give full play to their literary literacy and creativity, carefully select and combine the Chinese characters on the roulette wheel, and strive to spell accurate and far-reaching ancient poetry. This process not only tests the player's poetry reserve and combination ability, but also deeply stimulates the passion for literature and creation, so that every player can enjoy the fun of the game at the same time, feel the unique charm of Chinese poetry culture.

Rich content: The game not only includes tens of thousands of classic poems, covering literary treasures from ancient times to the present, but also carefully designed hundreds of themes to meet the interests and needs of different players. These themes include but are not limited to landscape and pastoral, family and country feelings, life philosophy, love and friendship, etc., each of which contains profound cultural connotation and emotional resonance.

It is helpful for children's education: players in the game will have the opportunity to access to these rich and diverse poetry works, through the way of spelling words, not only exercise the ability of poetry combination and creation, but also can inadvertently appreciate the profound Chinese poetry culture. At the same time, the diverse themes also add more fun and challenge to the game, so that players can enjoy the fun of the game, but also feel the infinite charm of the beauty of literature.

Exquisite ILLUSTRATION: In the game, each theme is equipped with an exquisite illustration, which is not only closely related to the theme, but also perfectly presents the artistic conception and emotion of the poem in front of the player with its delicate brush and vivid color.

Easy to understand translation: Each poem in the game is equipped with a literary translation, which is like adding an easy to understand "vernacular explanation" to each poem, so that you can more easily and deeply understand the artistic conception and meaning of the poem while spelling the words, and enjoy the beauty and wisdom of the poem.

Rich props: We have specially prepared five kinds of rich props for players, which can provide powerful help in the process of spelling words, make the game more smooth and interesting, avoid monotone, help you easily challenge the difficulties of poetry and enjoy the fun of spelling words.

Daily Poetry: Our "Daily poetry" module is closely linked to the festival, according to your interests to push the appropriate ancient poetry, not only can let you develop a good habit of learning a daily ancient poetry, but also can let you in a special day, through the poetry to feel the atmosphere of the festival, add spice to life.
